package.name: Piwik_Ecommerce
package.summary: This is a GPL released Extension that allows you to get your Magento Ecommerce Transaction data in your Piwik install.
package.description:
Piwik is an amazing open source analytics program. Now with this extension you get the power of Magento and analytics to match. This Piwik Extension will give you the following right out of the box:
Tracking of : -impressions of products detail pages viewed -impressions of categories viewed
Information from your Carts, including: -Product in carts -Items abandoned carts (lost revenue)
Information on Orders: -All you would expect including revenue, subtotal, tax, shipping. - Conversion rates by sku, category, and more
package.notes: Allows for simple access to Ecommerce Data in your Piwik Install. Welcome ideas, and code improvement at: http://code.google.com/p/piwik-magento/
